article_title: Hospitals blame losses on lack of Medicaid expansion; end to fight not in sight

article_metadata.author: ANDRA BRYAN STEFANONI astefanoni@joplinglobe.com

og.description: The fight over Medicaid expansion has left casualties on both sides of the state line.
